original: Ekerot, Nils Fredrik, rektor, Bräkne-Hoby, f. 26/5/04 i Kristianstad av överdiii-,. V. E. o. Mannia CairilisBOn. G. 31 m. Greta Huligren. I. 46, ordf. i hush :’sälLsk. JUF-komm. 46, v. ordf. i JUF-distr. 41, sekr. i län. lantbr :kl. 41, i lantmänn. fören:nd i Blek. 43, hush :säll’sk. repr. i länsblockmyndigh. 42.
translated:
Ekerot, Nils Fredrik was a principal from Bräkne-Hoby. He was born on May 26, 1904 in Kristianstad to parents V.E.O and Mannia CairilisBOn. He married Greta Huligren in 1931 and they had two children, Kerstin (born 1932) and Lars (born 1936). 

Ekerot completed his student exam in 1923 and agronomy exam at Alnarp's Agriculture and Dairy Institute in 1928. He studied in Germany in 1925 and Denmark in 1928. He was an assistant subject teacher at Önnestads Agriculture School from 1928 to 1930, a subject teacher at Blek. 1 Agriculture School from 1930 to 1947, and principal of Lsed. in 1947. 

He managed experimental agriculture at B'1'Tek since 1932 and managed the Binga Estate in Hossmo since 1938. He was appointed as chairman of the Agricultural Committee in Blek. I in 1946, chairman of the Household Society Youth Federation Committee in 1946, vice chairman of the Youth Federation District in 1941, secretary of the County Agriculture Club in 1941, member of the County Farmers' Association in Blek. in 1943, and representative of the County Block Authority for Household Societies in 1942.

memberOf.name: County Block Authority for Household Societies
